医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人格特质与精神疾病有关吗？全基因组研究揭示了遗传联系研究人员确定了 208 个重要的神经质位点，揭示了基因对人格特征的复杂影响及其与抑郁和焦虑等精神疾病的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Are-personality-traits-linked-to-psychiatric-disorders-Genome-wide-study-reveals-genic-connections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Are-personality-traits-linked-to-psychiatric-disorders-Genome-wide-study-reveals-genic-connections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6db5dfdc-e76c-42b9-962a-5313d12b75cd Tue, 13 Aug 2024 22:25:00 -0400 Are personality traits linked to psychiatric disorders? Genome-wide study reveals genetic connections
关于脂质诱导多巴胺能神经元衰老的新见解一项新的研究观点发表在 Aging 杂志（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”），第 16 卷，第 14 期，2024 年 7 月 19 日，题为“脂质积累驱动多巴胺能神经元的细胞衰老。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/New-insights-into-lipid-induced-senthesis-in-dopaminergic-neurons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/New-insights-into-lipid-induced-senthesis-in-dopaminergic-neurons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17bdab04-91e5-499f-a333-401c5090704d Tue, 13 Aug 2024 22:15:28 -0400 New insights into lipid-induced senescence in dopaminergic neurons
最大的多组学研究确定了结直肠癌的新遗传景观华大基因智能医学研究院（IIMR）与瑞典乌普萨拉大学合作，发表了迄今为止最大规模的结直肠癌（CRC）多组学研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Largest-multi-omics-study-identizes-new-genic-landscapes-in-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Largest-multi-omics-study-identizes-new-genic-landscapes-in-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a92ba237-02cf-4573-b7f5-3c1b9e3f7428 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 22:12:09 -0400 Largest multi-omics study identifies new genetic landscapes in colorectal cancer
澳大利亚的预期寿命在英语国家中领先澳大利亚人的寿命比其他五个高收入英语国家的同龄人多 1 至 4 年，其中大部分优势出现在 45 岁至 84 岁之间。滥用药物和酗酒、可治疗的癌症和心血管疾病导致的死亡率较低是关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Australia-leads-life-expectancy-among-English-speaking-nations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Australia-leads-life-expectancy-among-English-speaking-nations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d4623b1-735d-4091-8202-a102f0361b15 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 21:50:00 -0400 Australia leads life expectancy among English-speaking nations
Mrc1 蛋白被认为是分裂过程中维持细胞身份的关键在一项重大科学突破中，研究人员发现一种名为 Mrc1 的蛋白质在确保细胞在分裂和生长时保持其身份方面发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Mrc1- Protein-identified-as-key-to-maintaining-cell-identity-during-division.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Mrc1- Protein-identified-as-key-to-maintaining-cell-identity-during-division.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1ea0e42-6128-4f53-9696-36616649876d Tue, 13 Aug 2024 21:30:00 -0400 Mrc1 protein identified as key to maintaining cell identity during division
纳米颗粒为治疗与蜱虫叮咬有关的红肉过敏带来了新希望密歇根大学领导的新研究表明，通过静脉注射给小鼠注射纳米颗粒可以阻止孤星蜱叮咬引起的红肉过敏反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Nanoarticles-offer-new-hope-for-treating-red-meat-allergies-linked-to-tick-bites.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Nanoarticles-offer-new-hope-for-treating-red-meat-allergies-linked-to-tick-bites.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54e015cd-050a-4f4d-b56a-820a4b401975 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 20:57:52 -0400 Nanoparticles offer new hope for treating red meat allergies linked to tick bites
基于乳腺癌钙化状态的个体化治疗策略乳房X线照相钙化是乳腺癌的一个常见特征，但其分子基础和临床意义仍然是个谜，特别是在激素受体阳性、HER2阴性亚型中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Personalized-treatment-strategies-based-on-calcification-status-in-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Personalized-treatment-strategies-based-on-calcification-status-in-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fbaba4e-c1a8-4839-81c1-9c9200d801a6 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 20:45:40 -0400 Personalized treatment strategies based on calcification status in breast cancer
研究揭示非吸烟者肺部实性结节的患病率和大小分布一项针对 10,000 多名不吸烟成年人的新研究发现，相当一部分研究参与者存在实性肺结节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Study-reveals-the-prevalence-and-size-distribution-of-solid-lung-nodules-in-non-smokers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Study-reveals-the-prevalence-and-size-distribution-of-solid-lung-nodules-in-non-smokers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6ee0f85-b84e-48df-ab73-84176cbf59d8 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 20:38:21 -0400 Study reveals the prevalence and size distribution of solid lung nodules in non-smokers
科学家拨款 770 万美元用于开发罕见脑部疾病的治疗方法出生时大脑健康发育所需基因 SYNGAP1 受损的儿童会出现癫痫、感觉处理障碍、说话困难、智力障碍和类似自闭症的行为。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Scientists-awarded-2477-million-grant-to-develop-treatment-for-rare-brain-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/Scientists-awarded-2477-million-grant-to-develop-treatment-for-rare-brain-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=241c0408-​​9502-46c6-94bd-83fbb38146b0 Tue, 13 Aug 2024 14:45:36 -0400 Scientists awarded $7.7 million grant to develop treatment for rare brain disorder
NCI 拨款 310 万美元支持癌症患者的新心理健康模式抑郁症在患有可能无法治愈的癌症的人中很常见——这是可以理解的。但研究表明，抑郁症是可以治疗的，如果目标是让个人能够尽可能多地与家人、朋友、爱好或任何能给他们带来快乐和目标的事物接触，无论他们有多少时间，那么治疗抑郁症变得势在必行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/NCI-awards-2431-million-to-support-new-mental-health-model-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240813/NCI-awards-2431-million-to-support-new-mental-health-model-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6519f171-872c-4d8b-a16e-8ad41878fcec Tue, 13 Aug 2024 14:40:49 -0400 NCI awards $3.1 million to support new mental health model for cancer patients
